snippet: British tennis star Andy Murray has helped raise more than 83,000 pounds for Syrian refugee children by donating money for every ace he scored through his Andy's Aces initiative, the U.N. children's agency (UNICEF) said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: British tennis star Andy Murray has helped raise more than 83,000 pounds for Syrian refugee children by donating money for every ace he scored through his Andy's Aces initiative, the U.N. children's agency (UNICEF) said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Andy Murray Helps Syrian Refugees With Every Ace Scored
headline.main: Andy Murray Helps Syrian Refugees With Every Ace Scored
